name: Mailgun
natural_language_description: 这是 Mailgun 节点。主要用于: Sends an email via Mailgun

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.description: Email address of the sender optional with name
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: Email address of the sender optional with name | (必填项)

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
toEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Email | 作用: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma. | (必填项)

ccEmail.name: ccEmail
ccEmail.description: Cc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
ccEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Cc Email | 作用: Cc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

bccEmail.name: bccEmail
bccEmail.description: Bcc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
bccEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bcc Email | 作用: Bcc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

subject.name: subject
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Subject line of the email

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Plain text message of email

html.name: html
html.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML | 作用: HTML text message of email

attachments.name: attachments
attachments.description: Name of the binary properties which contain data which should be added to email as attachment. Multiple ones can be comma-separated.
attachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: Name of the binary properties which contain data which should be added to email as attachment. Multiple ones can be comma-separated.
